text: Daniel Patrick Pugh (born May 15, 1956), known professionally as Dan Patrick, is an American sportscaster, radio personality, and actor. He currently hosts The Dan Patrick Show broadcast on radio and television. He also currently co- hosts NBC's Football Night in America and serves as a senior writer for Sports Illustrated. He previously worked at ESPN for 18 years, where he often anchored the weeknight and Sunday 11 p.m. edition of SportsCenter. ==Other websites== *Dan Patrick Online Official website on CNN.com *Dan Patrick biography Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:People from Zanesville, Ohio
title: Dan Patrick
